property.name: Reverse
property.value: Geo Coding API for Google Maps

narrative.iWantTo: I can achieve a business goal

scenario.title: Get reversed geocode for Bedford Avenue
scenario.step: Given I have an longitude and latitude 40.714224,-73.961452
When I request google api for geocode with lontitude and latitude
Then I should get response status code 200
And I should get address 277 Bedford Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11211, USA
